image.title: Cloud Native & Open Source: A Team Lead’s Working Journal

item.title: Security Conference – BSides Galway, February 22nd, 2025
item.description:
It’s been a couple of years since I moved to Galway, and I’m still absolutely thrilled with my decision!

Over the past few months, I’ve had the chance to meet some awesome people at a local security meetup called BurbSec. It was a fantastic experience—sharing ideas, meeting new faces, and of course, enjoying a few beers! ;-) Now, some of these folks are organizing a security conference called BSIDES Galway, happening on February 22nd, 2025!
